title: que dodge timer
body:
simply, que dodge timer is stupid, why you ask.
I join a game and people are arguing over roles and we end up with (over 60% of the time) two mids or two jungles so what is te best thing to do ? considering playing the game like this is not going to work and at least 3 people are going to have their time wasted and not enjoy their experience.
que dodge, yes it is best if I leave, it is best if you leave. 

riot does not want us to be vocal about situations as that will inevitably result in a ban through reports and one sided automated decisions.
as they don't take into context what other people say just what you say, kind of like what the media does to sway the publics opion about something. Yes this is what you do riot don't deny.

so what else is there, well you can go through with the game waste 30 minutes as it most likely wont be 15 or 20 because the stubborn trolls wont ff and you know it, as you have no doubt experienced this many times before. This is the put up and shut up option where you decide to do nothing.
Now society says (lol) that sitting on the fence (doing nothing about a wrong situation) is just as bad or equivalent as to join the negative side. hmm.

so that leaves the best decision as to dodge the que and reset the opportunity to call lanes. As this DIFFUSES the situation (ohh snap)
But wait, so you que dodge and you , YOU get pinged with a 5 minute wait timer. ok can deal with that. its like getting a foul look from your boss for doing something he isn't happy with, no problem.
then up to 8, yes EIGHT hours later if the situation happens again. BAM 15 minutes. really. I mean REALLY riot.
So what is it you actually stand for then? so I have just over an hour to kill before I go to work of school or whatever perfectly safe amount of time to play a game, now I have 15min ban timer nope, too risky and not fair on others if I afk (because then I get stung AGAIN) after 30 min if the games not done then. so I miss out because I did the right thing by myself and others. errrr gj riot gj.

But you are never wrong are you? no, just deny deny deny that's how it works isn't it, like the match making? 
the other day I felt sooo sorry for the other team, we all ended up having scores above 9/1 max was 15/1 or something similar, the other team got so very outplayed, they just weren't even close to the same level but according to riot they were, you are so fair, and never wrong.
own your mistakes fix your game!

thankyou.

replies.body:
So what youre saying is _(and correct me if I'm wrong)_:
"You shouldnt be punished for dodging?"

If that is what you are trying to say, then you probably haven't considered all the implications this has.

Im a mid laner (arguably the most popular position). 
I do want to go mid most games. But often I lose the call and someone else gets mid and i have to support or ADC. That happens maybe 40% of the time?

If there was no punishment for dodging, whats to stop me dodging every time i don't get mid? In fact, whats to stop every single mid laner in existence from dodging every time they don't get mid?

Whats to stop every single player in the world dodging every game until they get their position?

Imagine if you physically couldn't play a game unless every singe player _(thats 10 players)_ got exactly the position they wanted. How long do you think that would take? You could spend a week and still not find a single playable game.

Thats why there are dodge penalties. The system doesn't know why you are dodging, it doesn't know that 'Player 3' is a c**t and is stealing your position. All it knows is that you prevented 9 other players from having theirs, by dodging.
So it punishes you accordingly.

Riot aren't stupid, they have teams of professionals working on all the different aspects of the game. You can be sure that they have spent a lot of time figuring out lots of different systems to help people get the lanes they want in a reasonable amount of time. 
And to date the system we have is probably the best one. If it wasn't, and there was one that was 100% better in every single way, I'm sure they would have used that one instead.
